name: Shougi Saikyou: Pro ni Manabu
overview: Shougi Saikyou - Pro ni Manabu is a shogi game that features different difficulty levels and game modes, etc. In one game mode the player can continue a started match against one of the 3 professional shogi players, in the other the player can start a new match against one of the game. The game features the professional shogi players: Naito Kurothi, Minami Kuro & Kamichi Roku.
